review: We have one of these upstairs and one downstairs and I don't know how we ever lived without them. Add the Chromecast extension to Chrome, and you can cast YouTube videos, Google play videos, Netflix, or just cast a tab. It's so handy.

review: Does what it's supposed to. Just as advertised. I've had little issues with streaming every now and then I get an interruption but it's very rare. I have Netflix Pandora and all the others integrated into my large Sony TV in our main living area but for the smaller TV that does not have that capability this is a perfect option and a very reasonable price
